com.whaleal.mars.core.query

类 TextQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.whaleal.mars.core.query.Query
      • com.whaleal.mars.core.query.TextQuery

  • public class TextQuery
extends Query
    Query implementation to be used to for performing full text searches.

      • TextQuery

        public TextQuery(String wordsAndPhrases)
        Creates new TextQuery using the the given wordsAndPhrases with TextCriteria
        参数:
        wordsAndPhrases -
        另请参阅:
        TextCriteria.matching(String)

      • TextQuery

        public TextQuery(String wordsAndPhrases,
                 String language)
        Creates new TextQuery in language.
        For a full list of supported languages see the mongdodb reference manual for Text Search Languages.
        参数:
        wordsAndPhrases -
        language -
        另请参阅:
        TextCriteria.forLanguage(String), TextCriteria.matching(String)

      • TextQuery

        public TextQuery(String wordsAndPhrases,
                 Locale locale)
        Creates new TextQuery using the locales language.
        For a full list of supported languages see the mongdodb reference manual for Text Search Languages.
        参数:
        wordsAndPhrases - must not be null.
        locale - can be null.

      • TextQuery

        public TextQuery(TextCriteria criteria)
        Creates new TextQuery for given TextCriteria.
        参数:
        criteria - must not be null.

        返回:

      • sortByScore

        public TextQuery sortByScore()
        Add sorting by text score. Will also add text score to returned fields.
        返回:
        this.
        另请参阅:
        includeScore()

      • includeScore

        public TextQuery includeScore()
        Add field score holding the documents textScore to the returned fields.
        返回:
        this.

      • includeScore

        Include text search document score in returned fields using the given fieldname.
        参数:
        fieldname - must not be null.
        返回:
        this.
